verses.verse: Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3045>make<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> her <S%H8441>abominations,<s%>

and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> "Your <S%H4351>origin<s%> and your <S%H4138>birth<s%> are from the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> your father was an <S%H1>Amorite<s%> and your <S%H567>mother<s%> a <S%H517>Hittite.<s%>

"As for your <S%H4138>birth,<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> you were <S%H3205>born<s%> your <S%H8270>navel<s%> <S%H8270>cord<s%> was not <S%H3772>cut,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> were you <S%H7364>washed<s%> with <S%H4325>water<s%> for <S%H4935>cleansing;<s%> you were not <S%H4414>rubbed<s%> with <S%H4414>salt<s%> or even <S%H2853>wrapped<s%> in <S%H2853>cloths.<s%>

<S%H3808>"No<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H2347>looked<s%> with <S%H2347>pity<s%> on you to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H259>any<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H428>things<s%> for you, to <S%H2550>have<s%> <S%H2550>compassion<s%> on you. Rather you were <S%H7993>thrown<s%> out into the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field,<s%> for you were <S%H1604>abhorred<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> you were <S%H3205>born.<s%>

"When I <S%H5674>passed<s%> by you and <S%H7200>saw<s%> you <S%H947>squirming<s%> in your <S%H1818>blood,<s%> I <S%H559>said<s%> to you [while you were] in your <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H2421>'Live!<s%>' I <S%H559>said<s%> to you while you were in your <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H2421>'Live!<s%>'

"I <S%H5414>made<s%> you <S%H7233>numerous<s%> like <S%H6780>plants<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%> Then you <S%H7235>grew<s%> up, <S%H1431>became<s%> <S%H1431>tall,<s%> and <S%H935>reached<s%> the <S%H935>age<s%> for <S%H5716>fine<s%> <S%H5716>ornaments;<s%> [your] <S%H7699>breasts<s%> were <S%H3559>formed<s%> and your <S%H8181>hair<s%> had <S%H6779>grown.<s%> Yet you were <S%H5903>naked<s%> and <S%H6181>bare.<s%>

"Then I <S%H5674>passed<s%> by you and <S%H7200>saw<s%> you, and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> you were at the <S%H6256>time<s%> for <S%H1730>love;<s%> so I <S%H6566>spread<s%> My <S%H3671>skirt<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you and <S%H3680>covered<s%> your <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%> I also <S%H7650>swore<s%> to you and <S%H935>entered<s%> into a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with you so that you <S%H1961>became<s%> Mine," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>
"Then I <S%H7364>bathed<s%> you with <S%H4325>water,<s%> <S%H7857>washed<s%> <S%H7857>off<s%> your <S%H1818>blood<s%> from you, and <S%H5480>anointed<s%> you with <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

"I also <S%H3847>clothed<s%> you with <S%H7553>embroidered<s%> <S%H7553>cloth,<s%> and <S%H9336>put<s%> <S%H9336>sandals<s%> of <S%H8476>porpoise<s%> <S%H8476>skin<s%> on your feet; and I <S%H2280>wrapped<s%> you with <S%H8336>fine<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%> and <S%H3680>covered<s%> you with <S%H4897>silk.<s%>

"And I <S%H5710>adorned<s%> you with <S%H5716>ornaments,<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H6781>bracelets<s%> on your <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and a <S%H7242>necklace<s%> <S%H5921>around<s%> your <S%H1627>neck.<s%>
"I also <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H5141>ring<s%> in your <S%H639>nostril,<s%> <S%H5694>earrings<s%> in your <S%H241>ears,<s%> and a <S%H8597>beautiful<s%> <S%H5850>crown<s%> on your <S%H7218>head.<s%>

"Thus you were <S%H5710>adorned<s%> with <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and your <S%H4403>dress<s%> was of <S%H8336>fine<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> <S%H4897>silk,<s%> and <S%H7553>embroidered<s%> <S%H7553>cloth.<s%> You <S%H398>ate<s%> <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour,<s%> <S%H1706>honey,<s%> and <S%H8081>oil;<s%> so you were <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H3302>beautiful<s%> and <S%H6743>advanced<s%> to <S%H4410>royalty.<s%>

"Then your <S%H8034>fame<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> on account of your <S%H3308>beauty,<s%> for it was <S%H3632>perfect<s%> because of My <S%H1926>splendor<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7760>bestowed<s%> on you," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

"But you <S%H982>trusted<s%> in your <S%H3308>beauty<s%> and <S%H2181>played<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of your <S%H8034>fame,<s%> and you <S%H8210>poured<s%> out your <S%H8457>harlotries<s%> on <S%H3605>every<s%> passer-by who might be [willing.]

"And you <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of your <S%H899>clothes,<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> for yourself <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>places<s%> of <S%H2921>various<s%> <S%H2921>colors,<s%> and <S%H2181>played<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> on them, which should <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> about <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1961>happen.<s%>

"You also <S%H3947>took<s%> your <S%H8597>beautiful<s%> <S%H3627>jewels<s%> <S%H6213>[made<s%>] of My <S%H2091>gold<s%> and of My <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I had <S%H5414>given<s%> you, and made for yourself <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H6754>images<s%> that you might <S%H2181>play<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> with them.

"Then you <S%H3947>took<s%> your <S%H7553>embroidered<s%> <S%H899>cloth<s%> and <S%H3680>covered<s%> them, and <S%H5414>offered<s%> My <S%H8081>oil<s%> and My <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

"Also My <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> you, <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour,<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%> with which I <S%H398>fed<s%> you, you would <S%H5414>offer<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them for a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma;<s%> so it <S%H1961>happened,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

"Moreover, you <S%H3947>took<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you had <S%H3205>borne<s%> to Me, and you <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> them to idols to be <S%H398>devoured.<s%> Were your <S%H8457>harlotries<s%> <S%H4592>so<s%> <S%H4592>small<s%> a matter?
"You <S%H7819>slaughtered<s%> My <S%H1121>children,<s%> and <S%H5414>offered<s%> them up to idols by causing them to <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> [the fire.]

"And <S%H854>besides<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8441>abominations<s%> and <S%H8457>harlotries<s%> you did not <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H5271>youth,<s%> when you were <S%H5903>naked<s%> and <S%H6181>bare<s%> and <S%H947>squirming<s%> in your <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

"Then it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H9567>wickedness<s%> <S%H188>('Woe,<s%> <S%H188>woe<s%> to you!' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%>),
that you <S%H1129>built<s%> yourself a <S%H1354>shrine<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> yourself a <S%H7413>high<s%> <S%H7413>place<s%> in <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7339>square.<s%>

"You <S%H1129>built<s%> yourself a <S%H7413>high<s%> <S%H7413>place<s%> at the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H1870>street,<s%> and <S%H8581>made<s%> your <S%H3308>beauty<s%> <S%H8581>abominable;<s%> and you <S%H6589>spread<s%> your <S%H7272>legs<s%> to <S%H3605>every<s%> passer-by to <S%H7235>multiply<s%> your <S%H8457>harlotry.<s%>

"You also <S%H2181>played<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> with the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> your <S%H1320>lustful<s%> <S%H1432><s%> <S%H7934>neighbors,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> your <S%H8457>harlotry<s%> to <S%H3707>make<s%> Me <S%H3707>angry.<s%>

<S%H2009>"Behold<s%> now, I have <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out My <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you and <S%H1639>diminished<s%> your <S%H2706>rations.<s%> And I <S%H5414>delivered<s%> you up to the <S%H5315>desire<s%> of those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> you, the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> who are <S%H3637>ashamed<s%> of your <S%H2154>lewd<s%> <S%H1870>conduct.<s%>

"Moreover, you <S%H2181>played<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> with the <S%H804>Assyrians<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> you were not <S%H7654>satisfied;<s%> you even <S%H2181>played<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> with them and <S%H1571>still<s%> were not <S%H7646>satisfied.<s%>

"You also <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> your <S%H8457>harlotry<s%> with the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H9211>merchants,<s%> <S%H3778>Chaldea,<s%> yet <S%H1571>even<s%> with <S%H384>this<s%> you were not <S%H7646>satisfied.<s%>"' "

<S%H4100>"How<s%> <S%H535>languishing<s%> is your <S%H3826>heart,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "while you <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4639>things,<s%> the <S%H4639>actions<s%> of a bold-faced <S%H2181>harlot.<s%>

"When you <S%H1129>built<s%> your <S%H1354>shrine<s%> at the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H1870>street<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> your <S%H7413>high<s%> <S%H7413>place<s%> in <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7339>square,<s%> in <S%H7046>disdaining<s%> <S%H868>money,<s%> you were not like a <S%H2181>harlot.<s%>
"You <S%H5003>adulteress<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> who <S%H3947>takes<s%> <S%H2114>strangers<s%> <S%H8478>instead<s%> of her <S%H376>husband!<s%>

"Men <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H5078>gifts<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2181>harlots,<s%> but you <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H5083>gifts<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H157>lovers<s%> to <S%H7809>bribe<s%> them to <S%H935>come<s%> to you from <S%H5439>every<s%> <S%H5439>direction<s%> for your <S%H8457>harlotries.<s%>

"Thus you are <S%H2016>different<s%> from those <S%H802>women<s%> in your <S%H8457>harlotries,<s%> in that <S%H3808>no<s%> one <S%H2181>plays<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> as you do, because you <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H868>money<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H868>money<s%> is <S%H5414>given<s%> you; thus you are <S%H2016>different.<s%>"
<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> O <S%H2181>harlot,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H3282>"Because<s%> your <S%H9323>lewdness<s%> was <S%H8210>poured<s%> out and your <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> through your <S%H8457>harlotries<s%> with your <S%H157>lovers<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8441>detestable<s%> <S%H1544>idols,<s%> and because of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of your <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H5414>gave<s%> to idols,

<S%H3651>therefore,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I shall <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H157>lovers<s%> with <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H6149>took<s%> <S%H6149>pleasure,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> those <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H157>loved<s%> [and] <S%H3605>all<s%> those <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H8130>hated.<s%> So I shall <S%H6908>gather<s%> them <S%H5921>against<s%> you from <S%H5439>every<s%> <S%H5439>direction<s%> and <S%H1540>expose<s%> your <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> to them that they may <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>

"Thus I shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> you, like women who <S%H5003>commit<s%> <S%H5003>adultery<s%> or <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> are <S%H4941>judged;<s%> and I shall <S%H5414>bring<s%> on you the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H2534>wrath<s%> and <S%H7068>jealousy.<s%>

"I shall also <S%H5414>give<s%> you into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of your lovers, and they will <S%H2040>tear<s%> <S%H2040>down<s%> your <S%H1354>shrines,<s%> <S%H5422>demolish<s%> your <S%H7413>high<s%> <S%H7413>places,<s%> <S%H6584>strip<s%> you of your <S%H899>clothing,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> away your <S%H3627>jewels,<s%> <S%H8597><s%> and will <S%H5117>leave<s%> you <S%H5903>naked<s%> and <S%H6181>bare.<s%>
"They will <S%H5927>incite<s%> a <S%H6951>crowd<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, and they will <S%H7275>stone<s%> you and <S%H1333>cut<s%> you to <S%H1333>pieces<s%> with their <S%H2719>swords.<s%>

"And they will <S%H8313>burn<s%> your <S%H1004>houses<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> and <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> on you in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H802>women.<s%> Then I shall <S%H7673>stop<s%> you from <S%H2181>playing<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot,<s%> and you will <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H5414>pay<s%> your <S%H868>lovers.<s%>

"So I shall <S%H5117>calm<s%> My <S%H2534>fury<s%> against you, and My <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> will <S%H5493>depart<s%> from you, and I shall be <S%H8252>pacified<s%> and <S%H3707>angry<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more.<s%>

<S%H3282>"Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> you have not <S%H2142>remembered<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H5271>youth<s%> but have <S%H7264>enraged<s%> Me by <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H428>things,<s%> <S%H1887>behold,<s%> I in <S%H1571>turn<s%> will <S%H5414>bring<s%> your <S%H1870>conduct<s%> <S%H5414>down<s%> on your own <S%H7218>head,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "so that you will not <S%H6213>commit<s%> this <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> on <S%H5921>top<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> your [other] <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> <S%H3605>everyone<s%> who <S%H9301>quotes<s%> <S%H9301>proverbs<s%> will <S%H9301>quote<s%> [this] <S%H9301>proverb<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'Like <S%H517>mother,<s%> like <S%H1323>daughter.<s%>'

"You are the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of your <S%H517>mother,<s%> who <S%H1602>loathed<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> and <S%H1121>children.<s%> You are also the <S%H269>sister<s%> of your <S%H269>sisters,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1602>loathed<s%> their <S%H376>husbands<s%> and <S%H1121>children.<s%> Your <S%H517>mother<s%> was a <S%H2850>Hittite<s%> and your father an <S%H1>Amorite.<s%>

"Now your <S%H1419>older<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%> is <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> who <S%H3427>lives<s%> <S%H8040>north<s%> of you with her <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> and your <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H269>sister,<s%> who <S%H3427>lives<s%> <S%H3225>south<s%> of you, is <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> with her <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

"Yet you have not merely <S%H1980>walked<s%> in their <S%H1870>ways<s%> or <S%H6213>done<s%> according to their <S%H8441>abominations;<s%> but, as if that were <S%H6985>too<s%> <S%H4592>little,<s%> you <S%H7843>acted<s%> <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H7843>corruptly<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H1870>conduct<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> they.

"As I <S%H2416>live,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H5467>"Sodom,<s%> your <S%H269>sister,<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> have not <S%H6213>done<s%> as you and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> have <S%H6213>done.<s%>
